title: What should you mention about the interview in your thank-up letter? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just mention a specific topic you discussed and why you enjoyed discussing it with them. If you’re not sure how to frame it, here’s a useful template: Email template: Thank you email Dear Mr. Stevenson, Thank you so much for meeting with me today. It was a great pleasure to learn more about the team and position, and I’m very excited about the opportunity to join your team and help improve the workflow with your company. I especially enjoyed talking to you about the determination to bring McDonalds’ services to every country in the world and the challenges posed by the diversity of our customers’ needs and expectations. I look forward to hearing from you about the next steps in the hiring process, and please do not hesitate to contact me if I can provide additional information. Best regards, Alan Fry
